ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] ...but it's still easier than playing a rogue
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually I hate Kunark.  Everytime I go there I lose xp faster than I gain it.  Probably due to the fact that I ve only really spent time there during guild
ygData.messageBody:
Actually I hate Kunark. Everytime I go there I lose xp faster than I gain
it. Probably due to the fact that I've only really spent time there during
guild events. As a result I've locked myself in lower guk until my 40's. I
should be emerging soon to head to Kunark now that I am "all grown up"
(Kunark came out when I was 35 on my live server)

Hoping to get into some good groups in karnor's and other (NON KEYED!!!)
dungeons.

----- Original Message -----
From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 17, 2000 3:56 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] ...but it's still easier than playing a rogue


> *Grin* Aren't we all just SO into Kunark.
> The only reason I've left since it opened was
> to buy spellS! And that for as little time as was necessary
> to do that.
>
> >-----Original Message-----
> >From: Gordon Hughes [mailto:ghughes@...]
> >Sent: Wednesday, May 17, 2000 12:59 PM
> >To: eqbards@egroups.com
> >Subject: RE: [eqbards] ...but it's still easier than playing a rogue
> >
> >
> >Ah. My bad. Sorry Kit ;)
> >
> >>Um. I think the original post meant Innothule Swamp.
> >>Not Kunark's swamp.
> >
